text:
Hello,

I am a highly skilled professional with deep expertise in HubSpot's Sales Hub and Service Hub. With a focus on account setup, lead flows, email marketing campaigns, and automation with workflows, I am dedicated to helping businesses unlock the full potential of HubSpot and achieve their sales and customer service goals. If you're looking for a knowledgeable and results-driven expert to guide you through the world of HubSpot, I am here to help. Let's connect and discuss how we can drive your business forward.
